item.title: The cache now gets stuck on downloading cache 0%
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

okay so iâ€™ve had problem after problem since thursday with the webclient, i have had to get a completely new signlink which now attempts to let the cachedownload (along with the CacheDownloader.java) however it just gets stuck on 0% when trying to download the cache, does anybody have an idea as to why, code:

signlink

    public static String cacheName()
    {
        return "MythScape";
    }

cachedownloader:

	private String cacheLink = "http://dl.dropbox.com/u/65113766/MythScape.zip"; // Link to cache

any help is appreciated, thanks
